channel.title: Comments on: Being a finalist for the Exceptional DBA of the Year
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Alex Kuznetsov
item.dc:creator: Alex Kuznetsov

item.title: By: Tahir Khalid
item.dc:creator: Tahir Khalid
item.content:encoded:
Well done mate,

Great Kudos for you and places you’re associated with (like LTD).

It’s very inspiring to read the achievements of the finalists and I hope it shows others anything is possible with some hard work!

Best of luck!

item.title: By: Christiaan Baes (chrissie1)
item.dc:creator: Christiaan Baes (chrissie1)
item.description: And he tries to remain humble and modest like I thought him so well.
item.content:encoded: And he tries to remain humble and modest like I thought him so well.

item.title: By: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.dc:creator: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.description: :-) Thank you, Phil! This has truly been one of my greatest accomplishments.
item.content:encoded: ðŸ™‚ Thank you, Phil! This has truly been one of my greatest accomplishments.

item.title: By: Phil Factor
item.dc:creator: Phil Factor
item.description: Many congratulations. A great achievement to get to the finals. Great to hear about your local paper covering the news!
item.content:encoded: Many congratulations. A great achievement to get to the finals. Great to hear about your local paper covering the news!

item.title: By: chopstik
item.dc:creator: chopstik
item.description: Like everyone else here, I hope you win. I am sure I am not the only one who has benefitted from your involvement in the community (both SQL and otherwise). I am glad that others recognize you for all of the things you've done.
item.content:encoded: Like everyone else here, I hope you win. I am sure I am not the only one who has benefitted from your involvement in the community (both SQL and otherwise). I am glad that others recognize you for all of the things you’ve done.

item.title: By: Alex Ullrich
item.dc:creator: Alex Ullrich
item.description: You've made all of LTD very proud with this one, Teddy boy!
item.content:encoded: You’ve made all of LTD very proud with this one, Teddy boy!

item.title: By: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.dc:creator: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.description: :-) Thanks to all of you. That means more than you know to hear it and why I try to work so hard on everything<br />
item.content:encoded: ðŸ™‚ Thanks to all of you. That means more than you know to hear it and why I try to work so hard on everything

item.title: By: Janice Lee
item.dc:creator: Janice Lee
item.content:encoded:
Ted,

Thanks for all the community help (read: all the pushing and encouragement and “fish”) when I started 3 months ago. Been to TWO usergroup mtgs since then! Imagine that. And hey, I’m blogging too.

I wouldn’t feel bad if the chicken wins; both you and me love that guy. But yeah, like SQLDenis, I still hope YOU win.

Good luck.

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.content:encoded:
Congratulations and good luck from me also.

All of the finalist deserver this but I still hope YOU win
